channel.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
channel.description:
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/3729/zl5e8w.png[/img]
Okay, basically in this where it says 'Chaos News'
How do I change that to what I want? Can someone please help as I have looked everywhere but cannot find it:(
Also, where it says 'Chaos Unleashed' at the top of the client.
How do I edit that?
Please help! Thanks<3

item.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

Main files to changing server name :

In your source:
Client.java
actionhandler.java
clickingbuttons.java
playerassistant.java
config.java

In your client:
client.java
gui.java
rsinterface.java
and maybe another rs.something.java not sure.

Just search for chaos

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
item.dc:creator: @jeake jeake
item.description:
@jeake wrote:

go to the cache and look for the alert in the sprites and it should be in right there, open it in paint, then get the black brush and color over the “InsidiaX” and i would reccomend saving after that then reopening it in case u mess up with the letters and dont have to restart, but from there just make a word box and type the server name in…

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
item.dc:creator: @WretchBack WretchBack
item.description:
@WretchBack wrote:

Are you talking about the alert box that you circled “InsidiaX”

if so, im pretty sure this has something to do with the cache…

Go into your cache and look for something called alert box or alert frame something that

then change it to whatever

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
item.dc:creator: @byFaith byFaith
item.description:
@byFaith wrote:

Are you sure that I should check in my client.java file? Because when I go into it, do ctrl-f and search for the key words, nothing comes up? Is it encrypted in any way? Please help guys!

Read full topic

item.title: InsidiaX 525 help!
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

ok go into your source and find your client,java folder, Click on it and search for (in your case) "[chaos news]
After searching you should be able to see where the message is typed and edit it how you would like.

For the Chaos unleashed! part at the top of your client, go into your client folders and search for chaos unleashed. You should be able to find the lettering and just edit it to say whatever you want it to.

Hope this helped!

Read full topic
